```{r, echo=FALSE, }
# Define the id for SoerenPetersen
id <- 'prKV9NwAAAAJ' 

# Get his profile and print his name
l <- scholar::get_profile(id)
#l$name 

# Get his citation history, i.e. citations to his work in a given year 
# get_citation_history(id)

# Get his publications (a large data frame)
publications <- scholar::get_publications(id) |> tibble::tibble()

publications_tbl <- publications |> tibble::tibble() 

# Display the table
publications_tbl[, c("title", "journal", "year", "cites")] |> 
  knitr::kable(caption = "List of Publications")
```
